ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treecomponent

Class CobwebAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treecomponent.CobwebAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAttribute, java.io.Serializable

    public final class CobwebAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAttribute, java.io.Serializable
    A simple parameter object, which stores attribute value probabilities of of a particular key in the attribute map of a node.
    Is immutable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        Determines if a de-serialized file is compatible with this class.

        Maintainers must change this value if and only if the new version of this class is not compatible with old versions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • attributeProbabilities

        private final com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Double> attributeProbabilities
        Attribute value - probability pairs.
        e.g.: 
           Rating Values  |    Probability
 -----------------------------------
       5          |       0.5
       1          |       0.25
       
 Probabilities do not necessarily add
 up to 1, due to the sparse nature of
 the user-content-rating matrix.

        probabilityMap - probability map of this attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getProbabilities

        public java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Double>> getProbabilities()
        Description copied from interface: IAttribute
        Gets an iterator over the attributes probability map.
        e.g.: 
           Rating Values  |    Probability
 -----------------------------------
       5          |       0.5
       1          |       0.25
       
 Probabilities do not necessarily add
 up to 1, due to the sparse nature of
 the user-content-rating matrix.


        Used for COBWEB.
        Specified by:
        getProbabilities in interface IAttribute
        Returns:
        an iterator over all probability map entries.

      • getSupport

        public int getSupport()
        Description copied from interface: IAttribute
        Gets the number of other attributes objects (i.e. ratings) on which this attribute object is based. Is 1 for a ClassitAttribute of a leaf node. * 
         Example:             Av:0.45
                      Std:0.3
                      Sup:4
                      /   \
                    /       \
                  /           \
           Av:0.4             Av:0.5
           Std:0.28           Std:0.42 
           Sup:2              Sup:2 
           /   \              /    \
          /     \            /      \
      Av:0.2   Av:0.6     Av:0.8    Av:0.2
      Std:0.0  Std:0.0    Std:0.0   Std:0.0
      Sup:1    Sup:1      Sup:1     Sup:1


        Used for CLASSIT.
        Specified by:
        getSupport in interface IAttribute
        Returns:
        the support value of this attribute.

      • getSumOfSquaredRatings

        public double getSumOfSquaredRatings()
        Description copied from interface: IAttribute
        Gets the sum of all squared ratings of children with the same attribute key. 
         Example:             S:24
                      S^2:174
                      Sup:4
                      /   \
                    /       \
                  /           \
           S:7                S:17
           S^2:29             S^2:145 
           Sup:2              Sup:2 
           /   \              /    \
          /     \            /      \
      S:2      S:5        S:8       S:9
      S^2:4    S^2:25     S^2:64    S^2:81
      Sup:1    Sup:1      Sup:1     Sup:1


        Used for CLASSIT.
        Specified by:
        getSumOfSquaredRatings in interface IAttribute
        Returns:
        the sum of all squared rating values of the attribute.
